sonusDsx1MIB.name: sonusDsx1MIB
sonusDsx1MIB.contactinfo: Customer Support Sonus Networks, Inc, 5 Carlisle Road Westford, MA 01886 USA Tel: 978-692-8999 Fax: 978-392-9118 E-mail: cs.snmp@sonusnet.com
sonusDsx1MIB.description: The MIB Module for DS1 Management.

sonusDsx1AdmnTable.name: sonusDsx1AdmnTable
sonusDsx1AdmnTable.description: Table of Sonus Enterprise Configurations for all DS1s

sonusDsx1AdmnEntry.name: sonusDsx1AdmnEntry
sonusDsx1AdmnEntry.description: Entry in Table consisting of the all the Sonus Enterprise DS1 Configurations

sonusDsx1AdmnProfileName.name: sonusDsx1AdmnProfileName
sonusDsx1AdmnProfileName.description: The name of the profile applied to this T1/E1 Table

sonusDsx1AdmnIfIndex.name: sonusDsx1AdmnIfIndex
sonusDsx1AdmnIfIndex.description: If Index for the corresponding standard MIB table

sonusDsx1AdmnTimeout.name: sonusDsx1AdmnTimeout
sonusDsx1AdmnTimeout.description: Max time in minutes before dryup takes place

sonusDsx1AdmnMode.name: sonusDsx1AdmnMode
sonusDsx1AdmnMode.description: T1/E1 span is in service or out of service.

sonusDsx1AdmnAction.name: sonusDsx1AdmnAction
sonusDsx1AdmnAction.description: Force out of service or wait for dryup

sonusDsx1AdmnIdleCode.name: sonusDsx1AdmnIdleCode
sonusDsx1AdmnIdleCode.description: Idle code to be applied to the channels

sonusDsx1AdmnAvailChannels.name: sonusDsx1AdmnAvailChannels
sonusDsx1AdmnAvailChannels.description: Bitstring map of channels that are available on this T1/E1 span.

sonusDsx1AdmnType.name: sonusDsx1AdmnType
sonusDsx1AdmnType.description: Type of DSx1. Indicates whether this span is a T1 span or E1 span.

sonusDsx1AdmnESThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnESThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnESThreshold.description: Errored Seconds threshold value for 15 minute interval. This is for near end.

sonusDsx1AdmnSESThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnSESThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnSESThreshold.description: Severely Errored Seconds threshold value for 15 minute interval. This is for near end.

sonusDsx1AdmnCSSThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnCSSThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnCSSThreshold.description: Severely Errored Seconds threshold value for 15 minute interval. This is for near end.

sonusDsx1AdmnDayESThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnDayESThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnDayESThreshold.description: Errored Seconds threshold value for a day. This is for near end.

sonusDsx1AdmnDaySESThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnDaySESThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnDaySESThreshold.description: Severely Errored Seconds threshold value for a day. This is for near end.

sonusDsx1AdmnDayCSSThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnDayCSSThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnDayCSSThreshold.description: Severely Errored Seconds threshold value for a day. This is for near end.

sonusDsx1AdmnFarESThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnFarESThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnFarESThreshold.description: Errored Seconds threshold value for 15 minute interval. This is for far end.

sonusDsx1AdmnFarSESThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnFarSESThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnFarSESThreshold.description: Severely Errored Seconds threshold value for 15 minute interval. This is for far end.

sonusDsx1AdmnFarDayESThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnFarDayESThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnFarDayESThreshold.description: Errored Seconds threshold value for a day. This is for far end.

sonusDsx1AdmnFarDaySESThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnFarDaySESThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnFarDaySESThreshold.description: Severely Errored Seconds threshold value for a day. This is for far end.

sonusDsx1AdmnPCVThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnPCVThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnPCVThreshold.description: Path Code Violations threshold value for 15 minute interval. This is for near end.

sonusDsx1AdmnLCVThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnLCVThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnLCVThreshold.description: Line Code Violations threshold value for 15 minute interval. This is for near end.

sonusDsx1AdmnUASThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnUASThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnUASThreshold.description: Unavailable Seconds threshold value for 15 minute interval. This is for near end.

sonusDsx1AdmnFarPCVThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnFarPCVThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnFarPCVThreshold.description: Path Code Violations threshold value for 15 minute interval. This is for far end.

sonusDsx1AdmnFarLCVThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnFarLCVThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnFarLCVThreshold.description: Line Code Violations threshold value for 15 minute interval. This is for far end.

sonusDsx1AdmnFarUASThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnFarUASThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnFarUASThreshold.description: Unavailable Seconds threshold value for 15 minute interval. This is for far end.

sonusDsx1AdmnDayPCVThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnDayPCVThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnDayPCVThreshold.description: Path Code Violations threshold value for a day. This is for near end.

sonusDsx1AdmnDayLCVThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnDayLCVThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnDayLCVThreshold.description: Line Code Violations threshold value for a day. This is for near end.

sonusDsx1AdmnDayUASThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnDayUASThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnDayUASThreshold.description: Unavailable Seconds threshold value for a day. This is for near end.

sonusDsx1AdmnFarDayPCVThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnFarDayPCVThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnFarDayPCVThreshold.description: Path Code Violations threshold value for a day. This is for far end.

sonusDsx1AdmnFarDayLCVThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnFarDayLCVThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnFarDayLCVThreshold.description: Line Code Violations threshold value for a day. This is for far end.

sonusDsx1AdmnFarDayUASThreshold.name: sonusDsx1AdmnFarDayUASThreshold
sonusDsx1AdmnFarDayUASThreshold.description: Unavailable Seconds threshold value for a day. This is for far end.

sonusDsx1AdmnInitCounters.name: sonusDsx1AdmnInitCounters
sonusDsx1AdmnInitCounters.description: Used to initialize all counters. Once enabled clears all T1/E1 counters.

sonusDsx1AdmnEchoProfileName.name: sonusDsx1AdmnEchoProfileName
sonusDsx1AdmnEchoProfileName.description: The name of the Echo Canceller profile applied to this T1/E1 Table

sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorAudioType.name: sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorAudioType
sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorAudioType.description: Echo Canceller Audio encoding type A-law or U-law

sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorNlpDisable.name: sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorNlpDisable
sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorNlpDisable.description: Echo Canceller Non-linear processing control, Disable

sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorNlpEnable.name: sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorNlpEnable
sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorNlpEnable.description: Echo canceller Non-linear processing control, Enable

sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorReturnLoss.name: sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorReturnLoss
sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorReturnLoss.description: For Network Echo Cancellation, specifies the echo return loss in dB's. Default value is 6dB.

sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorResidualEcho.name: sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorResidualEcho
sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorResidualEcho.description: For Network Echo Cancellation, specifies the residual echo cancellation.

sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorHiLevelComp.name: sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorHiLevelComp
sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorHiLevelComp.description: For Network Echo Cancellation, the high level compensation value. Default value is to attenuate by 6dB.

sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorModemDisable.name: sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorModemDisable
sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorModemDisable.description: For Network Echo Cancellation, specifies whether to disable echo cancellation when a modem tone is detected.

sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorNarrowbandDete.name: sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorNarrowbandDetection
sonusDsx1AdmnEchoCancellorNarrowbandDete.description: For Network Echo Cancellation, narrow band detection is OFF or ON. If set ON it narrows the G.164 detection bandwidth in G.165 mode to the G.165 band.

sonusDsx1StatTable.name: sonusDsx1StatTable
sonusDsx1StatTable.description: Table of Sonus Enterprise Status for all DS1s

sonusDsx1StatEntry.name: sonusDsx1StatEntry
sonusDsx1StatEntry.description: Entry in Table consisting of the all the Sonus Enterprise DS1 Status

sonusDsx1StatValidInt.name: sonusDsx1StatValidInt
sonusDsx1StatValidInt.description: Number of valid intervals of Performance Monitoring

sonusDsx1StatRxSlips.name: sonusDsx1StatRxSlips
sonusDsx1StatRxSlips.description: Number of frame slips in the receive direction.

sonusDsx1StatTxSlips.name: sonusDsx1StatTxSlips
sonusDsx1StatTxSlips.description: Number of frame slips in the transmit direction.

sonusDsx1StatLOF.name: sonusDsx1StatLOF
sonusDsx1StatLOF.description: Number of Loss of Frame defects that have occured.

sonusDsx1StatAIS.name: sonusDsx1StatAIS
sonusDsx1StatAIS.description: Number of AIS alarms that have occured.

sonusDsx1StatRAI.name: sonusDsx1StatRAI
sonusDsx1StatRAI.description: Number of RAI alarms that have occured.

sonusDsx1StatRED.name: sonusDsx1StatRED
sonusDsx1StatRED.description: Number of RED alarms that have occured.

sonusDsx1StatCRC.name: sonusDsx1StatCRC
sonusDsx1StatCRC.description: Number T1 CRC framing errors that have occured.

sonusDsx1StatCOFA.name: sonusDsx1StatCOFA
sonusDsx1StatCOFA.description: Number of Change of Frame Alignments that have occured.

sonusDsx1StatFBE.name: sonusDsx1StatFBE
sonusDsx1StatFBE.description: Number framing bit errors that have occured.

sonusDsx1StatStatus.name: sonusDsx1StatStatus
sonusDsx1StatStatus.description: T1/E1 span status. Indicates if port in alarm state, loopback state etc.

sonusDsx1StatAllocChannels.name: sonusDsx1StatAllocChannels
sonusDsx1StatAllocChannels.description: String display showing bitmap of channels that are currently allocated. A 1 indicates that the channel is allocated.

sonusDsx1StatEnabChannels.name: sonusDsx1StatEnabChannels
sonusDsx1StatEnabChannels.description: String display showing bitmap of channels that are currently enabled A 1 indicates that the channel is allocated.

sonusE1StatLOMF.name: sonusE1StatLOMF
sonusE1StatLOMF.description: Number of Loss of Multiframe alignments that have occured.

sonusE1StatMFError.name: sonusE1StatMFError
sonusE1StatMFError.description: Number of Multiframe CRC errors that have occured.

sonusE1StatFEBE.name: sonusE1StatFEBE
sonusE1StatFEBE.description: Number of Far End Block errors that have occured.

sonusE1StatOOOF.name: sonusE1StatOOOF
sonusE1StatOOOF.description: Number of Out of ofline framer errors that have occured.

sonusE1StatC2NCIWCK.name: sonusE1StatC2NCIWCK
sonusE1StatC2NCIWCK.description: Number of CRC 2 Non CRC framing events that have occured.

sonusE1StatRAIContCRC.name: sonusE1StatRAIContCRC
sonusE1StatRAIContCRC.description: Number of RAI and Continuous CRC errors that have occured.

sonusE1StatContFEBE.name: sonusE1StatContFEBE
sonusE1StatContFEBE.description: Number of Continuous FEBE errors that have occured.

sonusE1StatExcessCRC.name: sonusE1StatExcessCRC
sonusE1StatExcessCRC.description: Number of Excessive CRC errors that have occured.

sonusE1StatFASErr.name: sonusE1StatFASErr
sonusE1StatFASErr.description: Number of Frame Alignment Sequence Errors.

sonusDsx1StatSendPattern.name: sonusDsx1StatSendPattern
sonusDsx1StatSendPattern.description: Indicates status of SendCode variable for PATTERNS ONLY - does not include SendCodes that require loopback.

sonusDsx1StatStatusCode.name: sonusDsx1StatStatusCode
sonusDsx1StatStatusCode.description: T1/E1 span status. Indicates if port in alarm state, loopback state etc. Integer version of sonusDsx1StatStatus variable.

sonusDsx1StatLoopbackStatus.name: sonusDsx1StatLoopbackStatus
sonusDsx1StatLoopbackStatus.description: T1 loopback status display. Indicates loopback STATUS of T1 port.

sonusDsx1StatOperStatus.name: sonusDsx1StatOperStatus
sonusDsx1StatOperStatus.description: The actual status of the DS1 interface. Interface is Up if it is administratively in service and there are no line failures or hardware failures. Interface is Down if it is administratively in service and there are line failures or hardware failures, or if it is administratively out of service. Interface is DryingUp if it is administratively out of service and is drying up (no new calls, still carrying in-progress calls).

sonusDs0AdmnTable.name: sonusDs0AdmnTable
sonusDs0AdmnTable.description: Table of Sonus Enterprise Configuration for DS0s

sonusDs0AdmnEntry.name: sonusDs0AdmnEntry
sonusDs0AdmnEntry.description: Entry in Table consisting of the all the Sonus Enterprise Ds0 Configuration

sonusDs0AdmnTimeout.name: sonusDs0AdmnTimeout
sonusDs0AdmnTimeout.description: Max time in minutes before channel dryup takes place

sonusDs0AdmnMode.name: sonusDs0AdmnMode
sonusDs0AdmnMode.description: Channel is in service or out of service.

sonusDs0AdmnAction.name: sonusDs0AdmnAction
sonusDs0AdmnAction.description: Force out of service or wait for dryup

sonusDs0AdmnTone.name: sonusDs0AdmnTone
sonusDs0AdmnTone.description: Insert different tones into channel. Digital milliwatt

sonusDs1ProfileNextIndex.name: sonusDs1ProfileNextIndex
sonusDs1ProfileNextIndex.description: The next valid index to use when creating an entry in the sonusDs1ProfileTable.

sonusDs1ProfileEntry.name: sonusDs1ProfileEntry
sonusDs1ProfileEntry.description: Entry in Table consisting of T1/E1 profile. The T1/E1 profiles have to be created by users and then configured. These profiles can then be applied onto any T1/E1 span.

sonusDs1ProfileRowStatus.name: sonusDs1ProfileRowStatus
sonusDs1ProfileRowStatus.description: Profile: Row Status Needed for SNMP

sonusDs1ProfileDs1LineCoding.name: sonusDs1ProfileDs1LineCoding
sonusDs1ProfileDs1LineCoding.description: Profile: T1/E1 Line Coding, B8ZS, AMI, HDB3

sonusDs1ProfileDs1SignalMode.name: sonusDs1ProfileDs1SignalMode
sonusDs1ProfileDs1SignalMode.description: Profile: T1/E1 Signalling, Robbed Bit or None

sonusDs1ProfileDs1Fdl.name: sonusDs1ProfileDs1Fdl
sonusDs1ProfileDs1Fdl.description: Profile: T1 Facilities Data Link type

sonusDs1ProfileDs0IdleCode.name: sonusDs1ProfileDs0IdleCode
sonusDs1ProfileDs0IdleCode.description: Profile: Idle code to be used on all channels in this T1/E1 span

sonusDs1ProfileAvailChannels.name: sonusDs1ProfileAvailChannels
sonusDs1ProfileAvailChannels.description: Bitstring map of channels that are available on this T1/E1.

sonusDs1ProfileDs1LineBOState.name: sonusDs1ProfileDs1LineBOState
sonusDs1ProfileDs1LineBOState.description: Profile: Line Build Out State, used by profile code

sonusDs1ProfileDs1LineTypeState.name: sonusDs1ProfileDs1LineTypeState
sonusDs1ProfileDs1LineTypeState.description: Profile: T1/E1 Line type State, used by profile code

sonusDs1ProfileDs1LineCodingState.name: sonusDs1ProfileDs1LineCodingState
sonusDs1ProfileDs1LineCodingState.description: Profile: T1/E1 Line coding State, used by profile code

sonusDs1ProfileDs1SignalModeState.name: sonusDs1ProfileDs1SignalModeState
sonusDs1ProfileDs1SignalModeState.description: Profile: T1/E1 Signal Mode state, used by profile code

sonusDs1ProfileDs1FdlState.name: sonusDs1ProfileDs1FdlState
sonusDs1ProfileDs1FdlState.description: Profile: T1/E1 FDL State, used by profile code

sonusDs1ProfileDs0IdleCodeState.name: sonusDs1ProfileDs0IdleCodeState
sonusDs1ProfileDs0IdleCodeState.description: Profile: Channel Idle Code State, used by profile

sonusDs1ProfileType.name: sonusDs1ProfileType
sonusDs1ProfileType.description: Type of DSx1. Indicates whether this span is a T1 span or E1 span.

sonusDs1OutOfServiceReason.name: sonusDs1OutOfServiceReason
sonusDs1OutOfServiceReason.description: The reason for T1/E1 span going out of service

sonusDs1OutOfServiceType.name: sonusDs1OutOfServiceType
sonusDs1OutOfServiceType.description: The type of operation which caused T1/E1 span to go out of service

sonusDs1ThresholdType.name: sonusDs1ThresholdType
sonusDs1ThresholdType.description: Type of threshold that was crossed which caused a threshold crossing trap

sonusDs1LineState.name: sonusDs1LineState
sonusDs1LineState.description: The type of Alarm or failure which caused T1/E1 span to go out of service

sonusDs1AdmnState.name: sonusDs1AdmnState
sonusDs1AdmnState.description: The administrative state of the T1/E1 span.

sonusDsx1AdminChangeNotification.name: sonusDsx1AdminChangeNotification
sonusDsx1AdminChangeNotification.description: A sonusDsx1AdminChangeNotification trap indicates the DS1 admin changes. It is used to notify out-of-service, in-service, enabled and disabled

sonusDsx1OutOfServiceNotification.name: sonusDsx1OutOfServiceNotification
sonusDsx1OutOfServiceNotification.description: A sonusDsx1OutOfServiceNotification trap indicates that a T1/E1 span went out of service. The reason indicates the reason why and type indicates the type of failure or alarm.

sonusDsx1ThresholdCrossingNotification.name: sonusDsx1ThresholdCrossingNotification
sonusDsx1ThresholdCrossingNotification.description: A sonusDsx1ThresholdCrossingNotification trap indicates that a T1/E1 span threshold has been crossed. The type indicates the type of threshold.

sonusDsx1LineStatusChangeNotification.name: sonusDsx1LineStatusChangeNotification
sonusDsx1LineStatusChangeNotification.description: A sonusDsx1LineStatusChangeNotification trap indicates the T1/E1 span state changes. It is used to notify T1/E1 span Alarms states
